sequence:
Lively Afternoon Tea Party II

<size=45>「A Queen Afraid of Loneliness」</size>

scripts.say: Thank goodness Belfast brought black tea...
As a maid of the Royal Navy, having tea on-hand is a given.
(Bites lip) I’m also a maid, so, so… tea should be a must-have?
After tasting the bitterness of matcha, I will cherish even more the sweetness of other foods.
Having black tea after tasting matcha tea, what an opportunity to compare the two flavours.
{namecode:13} also wants to try the black tea prepared by Belfast!
Hey, all of you didn’t care to invite me to this tea party!
Hmm, didn't your Majesty once say to me, “As Queen, I have a tremendous amount of tasks and responsibilities, how can I possibly spend time with you commoners!”
But, but everyone is gone and I am all alone. It’s very.... Wait, are you telling me I'm not welcomed here!

Of course you're welcome here~ You honour us with your presence. The fact that your Majesty can take time out of your busy schedule to join us for this tea party makes me feel privileged~ Please take a seat your Majesty.
Come to think of it, Belfast you failed in your duties! I told you last night before bed to wake me up this morning! I ended up sleeping until noon, it’s all your fault!
Yes of course your Majesty, I failed in my duties as maid to wake you from your sleep. I will take to heart this dereliction of duty as a serious offense——
No matter, if you’ll tell me bedtime stories every night henceforth then I shall forgive you. I slept a little late last night indeed. So, where’s my tea?
Here~ this tea was especially prepared for you by the Sakura Empire. I hope that your Majesty likes it~
A single person alone can be a bit… but——Ninja {namecode:11} will never give up even if I'm facing danger alone! Here I come, North Union!
